Usage worn headwear or belt (typically a sash)

This symbol of victory—whether a laurel worn around the head or a medal that hangs from your neck—reminds you and your allies that victory is the only acceptable outcome.

Immanence (aura, emotion, mental) You inspire your allies to greater glory. You and all your allies in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:15] gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls.

Transcendence—One Moment till Glory 1 (concentrate, emotion, mental, transcendence) You rally your allies, carrying them from the brink of disaster to the verge of victory. Each ally in your aura can immediately attempt a new saving throw with a +2 status bonus against one ongoing negative effect or condition currently affecting them, even if that effect would not normally allow a new saving throw.
